DOC.brief_title: Serum Endocan Levels Polycystic Ovary Syndrome
DOC.detailed_description: Polycystic ovary syndrome disorder associate insulin resistance , diabetes , obesity , cardiovascular disease . Endothelial dysfunction , know early marker atherosclerosis , also show association poycystic ovary syndrome . In study investigator aim investigate whether relation polycystic ovary syndrome serum endocan level . For purpose investigator design prospective study include two group . The diagnosis polycystic ovary syndrome make presence ; oligo- and/or anovulation , clinical hyperandrogenism polycystic ovary . Clinical hyperandrogenism define presence hirsutism , acne , presence androgenic alopecia , body mass index ( BMI ) calculate weight kilogram divide square height meter . The two group compare consider serum endocan level , follicle stimulate hormone ( FSH ) , luteinizing hormone ( LH ) , Dihydroepiandesterone sulphate ( DHEAS ) , total testesterone ( TT ) , estradiol ( E2 ) thyroid stimulate hormone ( TSH ) , fast blood glucose , triglyceride , total cholesterol , high density lipoprotein , low density lipoprotein , C-reactive protein ( CRP ) level .
DOC.criteria: 18 45 year Patients diagnose PCOS accord Rotterdam criteris ( study group ) Patients without PCOS menstrual irregularity ( control group ) Absence significant abnormality physical examination except hirsutism No lipid lowering , hypoglycemic , antihypertensive hormone replacement therapy Normal thyroid function prolactin level Absence history evidence metabolic , cardiovascular , respiratory hepatic disease Pregnant Ovarian tumor Endocrine disease ( Cushing disease , 21Hydroxylase enzyme deficiency , thyroid dysfunction , hyperprolactinemia , diabetes ) Chronic disease ( renal insufficiency , cardiovascular , hepatic disease ) Oral contraceptive use , antiandrogenic , glucocorticoid , antihypertansive antidiabetic drug use Smoking alcohol use
